Topic.Title: Why did ON2 have two CTOs: From 2007 to 2010?

Message.Msg: Nufront NS115 Adopts Hantro Video IP Press Release: VeriSilicon – Tue, Sep 4, 2012 7:30 PM EDT "Nufront is a fabless semiconductor company with strong R&D ability and technology capability. We are proud to support their efforts in integrating Hantro video IP into their product," says Dr. Wayne Dai, President and CEO of VeriSilicon. "We are confident that VP8 video format based technologies will become ubiquitous in multi-media smart devices." SHANGHAI, Sept. 5, 2012 /PRNewswire/ -- VeriSilicon Holdings Co., Ltd. ... ("VeriSilicon"), a world-class, custom silicon solutions and semiconductor IP provider, announced today that Hantro G1 Multi-format Decoder and Hantro H1 Multi-format Encoder have been integrated by Nufront, a leading fables semiconductor company in China, in a high performance application processor chip, NS115. VeriSilicon's Hantro video IPs enable Nufront's NS115 to achieve full HD video encode and decode capability, while supporting multiple video formats such as VP8 for WebM and WebRTC, H.264, MVC, MPEG-2/4, DivX, VC-1, RealVideo, AVS, etc. NS115 integrates two 1.5GHz ARM Cortex-A9 cores and is designed and manufactured in advanced 40nm LP process node. Through the integrated Hantro G1 Multi-format Decoder... and Hantro H1 Multi-format Encoder, -------- October 26, 2009 SELECTED CONSOLIDATED HISTORICAL FINANCIAL DATA OF ON2 ON2's Research and development 1) Year Ended December 31, 2004 $884,000 2) Year Ended December 31, 2005 $1,035,000 3) Year Ended December 31, 2006 $972,000 4) Year Ended December 31, 2007 $3,833,000 5) Year Ended December 31, 2008 $10,736,000 ---------------- 1) Six Months Ended June 30, 2008 $5,817,000 2) Six Months Ended June 30, 2009 $3,885,000

Message.Msg: Tomi Jalonen PAST: Tomi Jalonen, On2 Technologies, Inc. | Spoke Tomi Jalonen, On2 Technologies, Inc. of On2 Technologies, Inc CURRENT: Re: VeriSilicon Releases New Generation of Hantro Video IP Products 24-Feb-12 11:30 pm Tomi Jalonen VeriSilicon and WebM Support Monday, January 24, 2011 | 4:43 PM Guest blogger Tomi Jalonen is Director of Product Marketing for Hantro video IP at VeriSilicon

O'Hare and Hieb were moved from Hambrecht to Oppenheimer and then to anotjher company after completing ON2 acquisition of Hantro AND They Moved Tomi from ON2 to Verisilicon to CONTINUE promoting ON2's Hantro with semiconductors companies: Pete Wendell, Erich Schmit's friend is INVESTED in Sierra and Sierra and Verisilicon: Tomi Jalonen PAST: Tomi Jalonen, On2 Technologies, Inc. | Spoke Tomi Jalonen, On2 Technologies, Inc. of On2 Technologies, Inc CURRENT: Re: VeriSilicon Releases New Generation of Hantro Video IP Products 24-Feb-12 11:30 pm Tomi Jalonen VeriSilicon and WebM Support Monday, January 24, 2011 | 4:43 PM Guest blogger Tomi Jalonen is Director of Product Marketing for Hantro video IP at VeriSilicon

Message.Title: NTWK $5.3 UP 33c....BREAKING OUT!! NEW TARGET $16...GUIDES FOR 40% 2013 REVENUE GROWTH & $1/SHARE NET INCOME. NEW CLOUD DIVISION ANNOUNCEMENT IS HUGE!!..September 6, 2012. NTWK created a new division, NetSolCloudVM, that will offer infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS), initially targeting the North American market. Set to launch in September as a division of NetSol North America, NetSolCloudVM will provide clients with IT infrastructure on a monthly tiered subscription basis
Message.Msg: SHORT TERM TARGET $10+ .......2013 GUIDANCE: 40% GROWTH AND $1/SHARE NET INCOME NTWK'S OTHER CLOUD DIVISION VROOZI ALREADY EXPLODED IN REVENUES IN Q4 2012.....POTENTIAL ACQUISITION TARGET WITH CLOSE TIES TO SAP 3M SHARE FLOAT......AFTER EARNINGS PROFIT TAKING OVER.....MAGNIFICENT CHART In its updated public cloud forecast in June, Gartner estimated that IaaS was the fastest growing cloud segment with a projected GAGR of 41.7%, and exceeding a $20 billion global market by 2016. "We made a calculated decision to enter this growing market given our years of experience as a software developer, the minimal investment required, and the revenue potential given just the breadth of our current relationships," said Najeeb Ghauri, chairman and CEO of NetSol. "I am fully confident in our highly capable team, reinforced by our talented group of IT professionals, to scale the business quickly and capture a portion of this burgeoning industry, creating an additional revenue driver and further diversifying our revenue mix by geography." "What we are offering, in essence, is private cloud performance at an elastic cloud price -- giving potential customers in our target market segment the performance, flexibility, reliability, and a no-nonsense fixed pricing model that they have long desired," added Imran Haider, COO of NetSol North America and head of NetSolCloudVM. "As a growing software company ourselves, we have critical insights into the efficiency and productivity needs of NetSolCloudVM's target customer base and look forward to unveiling our new services in the coming months." ===== 4Q and FY 2012 EARNINGS SUMMARY......9/4/2012 NetSol Technologies Reported RECORD Fiscal Fourth Quarter and Year-End Results - 9/4/2012 - Fourth Quarter 2012 Revenue Surges to an all-time quarterly record of $14.3 Million on Increased License Revenues and associated maintenance and service agreements going forward - Fourth Quarter 2012 Earnings Advance Significantly to $0.25 per Diluted Share - Full Year 2012 revenues a record $38M - Full Year 2012 Earnings of $0.39/share - Company Expects Record Fiscal 2013 Annual Revenue Growing over 30% to $46 million to $49 million, With Earnings per Diluted Share Advancing to $0.80 to $1.00 - Per the CC, Company anticipates doubling revenues and net income by 2015 NTWK HIGHLIGHTS: - Only 3 million share float - Fast growing profitable US-based global cloud and license-based software company with 8 offices worldwide (US, China, Australia, UK, Pakistan, Singapore, Thailand, Saudi Arabia) – - Trading at 5 PE and 1 times sales – This is about 25% of sector average - Revenues are increasing at double digit rates, - Guidance calls for 30% revenue growth in 2013 - 3 consecutive quarters of profitability, - Guidance calls for $1/share net income in 2013!!! - Global alliances with Mercedes Benz and SANY Corp of China. - No. 1 in China and the APAC region in its niche market of leasing and financing software - It’s Vroozi Division is a fast growing Cloud Computing Play with strong relations with SAP, ORCL, MSFT. - Vroozi’s SAP-approved smartOCI procurement search catalog software built on SaaS is being adopted rapidly. Revenues exploded in 4Q 2012 and are expected to multiply in 2013 and a big reason for the 30%+ 2013 projected revenue increase - Vroozi has been created as independent entity to potentially IPO it or sell it to a cloud-acquiring giant like SAP and others - Strong balance sheet with $1/share Cash - With every license they sell a lucrative 5-year service and maintenance agreement building strong recurrent revenues - Huge and consistent insider buying. Insiders bought over 5% of the outstanding shares since 2010 - Strong institutional investor support grew to almost 20% from 11% last year - NTWK has over 50 Fortune 100 loyal customers. Never lost a customer. None of the customers is over 5% of the total revenues - partial customer list: CitiGroup, Mercedes Benz, Santander, BMW, Volvo, Ford, GE Capital, Cisco Capital, Paribas, GMAC, Toyota, Nissan, Hyundai, BYD, SANY Corp. China, etc.process of testing our new message boards. Please provide your feedback so that we can optimize the user experience.

Message.Title: Any update on split? Is that why this stock is running up?
Message.Msg: Hi: Do any of you folks have any links to news on the split. It was supposed to happen in September. And once the details are announced, all current options will become adjusted to handle the split. That will cause a drop in volume on the adjusted options. At that point MMs start increasing the spreads on adjusted options. Is this why the stock is running up - to trap option holders whose options become adjusted due to the split and harder to trade? Appreciate the inputs of the expert traders on this board. I personally think this stock is going down because the problems with their Motorola acquisition are just beginning. Just watch how their margins shrink over the next couple of quarters. I worked closely with Motorola at the highest levels and its worse and slower than a government agency. TIA

Message.Title: Why can't so many see through Obama??/
Message.Msg: Quote taken from above link on Yahoo Finance Home Page titled: 'Romney Tax Plan: The Math Does Add Up Says Romney Advisor Glenn Hubbard': "President Obama wants to extend tax cuts for middle class Americans and raise them on households making more than $250,000 a year." That sentence is ridiculous and another dem complete OXYMORON just as is any talk of financial reform by dems with the BIGGEST TAX EVER YET TO KICK IN 2014 Obamacare Unaffordable Care Act. Again why do you think the dems delayed it from kicking in until 2014? Easy to blame repubs for the obvious failure if Romney gets in and to gloat if Obama wins and the USA is indeed 100% on the dole now favoring a UK socialist type government. One has to be completely naïve to believe $250,000 per year is rich (even though it may seem so to us not making that much.) Two things must be kept in mind:1. And most important all S-Corps and LLC's filing as corporations pay taxes at the individual level with the corporate taxes flowing through their personal returns as a conduit. This means under the Obama plan all such corporations earning over 250K get hit killing more jobs. 2: Ron Paul is correct in his assertion that a dollar today is worth about $.03 (3 cents) when compared to a 1913 silver dollar (the year dems signed the Federal Reserve Bank CREATURE into law.Do the math $250,000 x $.03 and there you have it the real Obama con about those evil filthy rich over $250K.

These Pollsters are in the bag for Obama and the numbers are a scam. Carter was 17 points ahead of Reagan and Reagan won. Polls are meaningless until ONE WEEK before the election. Then they give you real numbers so they don't look so stupid. Now, they are just trying to get Omama some momentum.

The only thing that doesn't work is Obama. He's present but absent from any important decision. He avoids them because he is unable to draw upon any knowledge or experience. He is just and empty "clean" suit. His time has past and the only job he will ever create is the one opened after he is thrown out like yesterday's trash. A total & complete failure at every leavel. They should build him an empty library to house his engo and nothing else.
